Reviews.Title: Edge2 series nowhere near as good as older Edge+ Series
Reviews.Author: L. Helber

Reviews.Title: Okay device...needs better web interface and management
Reviews.Author: TR Bowlin

ProductInfo.Features:
High Definition interface with HDMI output for easy connection to a TV.
Powerful performance in a compact size. The smallest full-featured DVR in the market.
Use your smartphone, tablet, PC, or Mac to connect, view and control your system.
Internet setup wizard, triple touch operation and dedicated Apps give you the peace of mind at the tips of your fingers.
Includes two (2) Octopus BNC connectors, remote control, USB mouse, flex IR extender, multi-voltage power supply, Ethernet cable & CD with client software
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex LH3361001 Vantage EDGE2 Digital Video Surveillance Recorder (Black)
